RepresentationProxy.name: EnsembleSurfaceSlicingRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: This is a representation that enabled the Ensemble Surface Slicing technique. This representation is available only for multiblock datasets. To create a multiblock data set from several input geometries, select the geometries and use the Group Datasets filter to combine them.

Extension.name: GeometryRepresentation
Extension.Documentation: Extends standard GeometryRepresentation by adding EnsembleSurfaceSlicingRepresentation as a new type of representation.
